document.full_text: fulham unveiled a statue of michael jackson outside its stadium on sunday, with team chairman mohamed al fayed telling fans to support another premier league club if they don't like the idea.
document.title: fulham unveils michael jackson statue
lines_and_colors: fulham unveiled a statue of michael jackson outside its stadium on sunday, with team chairman mohamed al fayed telling fans to support another premier league club if they don't like the idea.
